name: GunHanded
description:
Gunhanded, is a game made for the Dungeon Crawler Jam 2023. Developed in Godot 4, the game uses first person shooting mechanics inspired by games like House of The Dead.

Increase your combo with every shot to obtain larger rewards at the end of the dungeon, heal yourself by switching to healing bullets and buy upgrades at the shop.

  1. CONTROLS
  2. MOVE: WASD, IJKL or NUMPAD 8456
  3. TURN: Q-E, U-O OR NUMPAD 7-9
  4. SHOOT: LEFT CLICK
  5. SWITCH AMMO: RIGHT CLICK
  6. RELOAD: R, Y or NUMPAD +

CREDITS:
